Author: opium
Title: BIDIUM: Bidium Contributors can apply to withdraw of tokens from 11th July
Body: Answers to frequently asked questions from their telegram chat:  Token withdrawal will start from 11th July upto 17th July. And bounty tokens distribution will be after 17th July. ✔️ Bounty Phase1 and Phase2 distribution will be together. ✔️ Bounty Phase1 stakes calculation will be finalized before bounty distribution. We apologise for inconvenience. ✔️ No KYC needed for token withdrawals or for distribution until we didn't detect any suspicious activity from any users. ✓ After Distribution of all tokens, only after that token burn process will start. ✔️Bidium will be listed on Bidium's Beta version exchange. It will be secure and fast. ✔️ Beta version will be released in Q3 2018 end. ✔️ After distribution of all tokens, we will update  with development phase of Beta release every week.  ✔️ Please be touch on Bidium's social media channels and telegram for any updated information. ✓ If you have any additional query , we will be happy to solve it.

Author: setpass
Title: BIDIUM: Bidium Contributors can apply to withdraw of tokens from 11th July
Body: Bidium Token Withdraw delay  Bidium apologize for delay. We have received withdrawal request from Bidiums’ Pre-ICO contributors, ICO contributors and Airdrop participants . Due to our smart contract issues it is taking time to solve the issue , hence we need 7 days more that means 25th July to find the solution. If problem persists the same, we will postponed the sending tokens to ERC20 wallet and all the withdrawal requests made by users will be transferred to Bidium Beta Exchange (Users account automatically will migrate to Beta Exchange, No need to create account). Bidium Tokens will be available to trade only on Bidium’s Exchange, so if you receive tokens in ERC20 wallet , lastly to trade you need to send tokens to Bidium Beta Exchange. We will announce the final conclusion on 25th July about Main token distribution  Bounty phase1 and phase2 token distribution announcement will be on 2nd August.  Bidium’s Beta Exchange launch will be in September 2018. We will keep update on development phase until its launch.

Author: Kirilp
Title: BIDIUM: Bidium Contributors can apply to withdraw of tokens from 11th July
Body: Bidium Announces Buy-Back Policy https://bidium.io/blog/bidium-announces-buy-back-plicy/  Bidium, the cryptocurrency exchange combining the power of Advanced Auction with Freelance Hiring, is now moving towards its maturity. The platform now announces the last chance to buy BIDM tokens with bonus and be eligible for Buy Back Policy.  Now, what actually is this BuyBack Policy? So one can easily recognize BIDM as a safe token. It is a smart contract guided by some amazing principle such as Buy-back. An attempt to keep the currency safe. If the coins go below the percentage of their initial value i.e 0.02USD, as on the date of contract creation covering the value of user’s investment, it can be surrendered to the company before the mentioned date.  As discussed, the bidium Pre ICO and ICO contributors can sell directly to Bidium at the price of 0.02 USD/BIDM, if there are any chances of further fall in the currency from 0.02 USD.

Body: Hey Glorious! Glad to see a profound statement that came along with a strong backing on what blockchain technology is.  The truth of the matter, blockchain is absolutely wonderful (as you cited it's transparency and cost of service, add to that its immutability), but its decentralization is what makes it difficult for traditional entities to adopt blockchain.  It is really worrisome not to have a central control when you are in an auction and bidding market, but slowly with the advent of disruptive ideas and technologies such as Bidium, people and businesses are starting to see the brighter side of decentralization and blockchain technology.  Let's do hope that we see Bidium in action soon and be able to put in use their promised algorithm of "Proof of Stake".

Author: bioessential
Title: BIDIUM: Bidium Contributors can apply to withdraw of tokens from 11th July
Body: BIDIUM is a decentralized cryptocurrency exchange which combines the power of Advance Auction with Freelance Hiring on top of Blockchain Technology. It acts as a bidding marketplace for buyers to purchase by bidding and a freelance platform to employers, who are looking to hire freelancers. The transaction could be made with the aid of more than 10 coins. The exchange accepts BIDM (Bidium native token), Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin and other coins that will be announced at a later stage. The platform offers buyers and sellers the opportunity to save time as there is a limited time period of 24 hours to bid for any product. This will provide sellers an assurance of getting authorized buyers only, which in turn prevent their products from being blocked by malicious buyers. In addition to this the freelance platform will give both freelancers and employers the opportunity to use our native coin by paying only 0.1% charges while the use of another coin will attract 1% charge. The major benefit to the sellers is they will get 50% Ad profit shares, regardless of whether their products are sold or not and if their products are sold, even buyers also will get 30% Ad profit shares if product sold. Sellers have the opportunity of selling multiple quantities of the same product on different slots. The platform offers an adequate exchange solution along with an effective freelance platform backed up with an interactive interface to make it a delightful experience for the users. The platform facilitates light and fast trading technique with 50% generated revenue from trading. The revenue will be distributed among all BIDM token holders i.e. usually stored on the BIDIUM wallet. There is no transaction fee for the transfer of BIDM tokens between BIDIUM platform users. In addition to this, only a 0.05% trading fee will be charged on exchange platform and it will be further reduced to a 0.01% trading fee for BIDM token holders. An offline wallet will be developed to store BIDM securely. The BIDM token will also be used to bid for products on the BIDIUM marketplace.

Author: becruxrubbish
Title: BIDIUM: Bidium Contributors can apply to withdraw of tokens from 11th July
Body: A Crypto Exchange dedicated to Auction and Hiring by empowering Bidders and Employers. BIDIUM is a decentralized cryptocurrency exchange which combines the power of Advance Auction with Freelance Hiring on top of Blockchain Technology. It acts as a bidding marketplace for buyers to purchase by bidding and a freelance platform to employers, who are looking to hire freelancers. The platform offers an adequate exchange solution along with an effective freelance platform backed up with an interactive interface to make it a delightful experience for the users. The revenue will be distributed among all BIDM token holders i.e. usually stored on the BIDIUM wallet. The platform facilitates light and fast trading technique with 50% generated revenue from trading. No transaction fee for the selling, purchasing, hiring and trading on BIDIUM platforms users.

Author: BooTheGreat
Title: BIDIUM: Bidium Contributors can apply to withdraw of tokens from 11th July
Body: BIDIUM gives the solutions to the problems being encountered by the current systems regarding bidding and freelance platform to employers.  1. Lack of Transparency in Skill Evaluation: Bidium platform which is decentralized bidding platform aims to improve transparency. It also makes bidding for good and services more competitive through evaluation and pre-qualification against the set of instructions (bidding rules).  2. Customer Support:   It is a must to have a reliable means of providing customer support for buyers and sellers to have a good business reputation which may result to increase of profit.  3. Longer Transaction Time: To speed up transaction time, Bidium platform has a better approach as a decentralized and virtual mechanism. No time delay in delivering the information to their customers.  4. Probability of false transactions. By using Online decentralized bidding marketplace, buyers and sellers prevent from wasting time thereby giving sellers access to guaranteed buyers and reasonable profit.

Author: Jlimao28
Title: BIDIUM: Bidium Contributors can apply to withdraw of tokens from 11th July
Body: Eventhough eBay and amazon gained their popularity, Bidium can surpass them. As a matter of fact, Bidium has a wide range when it comes in marketplace. Here are some factors that bidium can be the future marketplace for products and services: 1. Decentralized- using the blockchain technology, buyers and sellers can connect using a P2P network, individual holds each own copy of data since all datas are stored in blockchain. 2. Transparent and reliable- since Bidium is made using Dapps, expect that fraudulent reviews and hidden costs will never exist. 3. Cryptocurrency is the trend nowadays- a lot of people are engage with crypto industry. It is possible that freelancer may change their direction leading to a better future, Bidium. 4. Secured wallet- though amazon used paypal as a means of exchange, we can't deny the fact that it can easily intercepted by hackers. Bidium uses integrated mobile wallet which is basically for receiving and sending of payments. This shows that you will be able to transfer funds for goods or services in the bid marketplace in a secured and improve wallet.  Why amazon and eBay? Bidium is just starting but all of the problems regarding to old marketplaces can solve by this decentralized platform.

Author: Bobby park
Title: BIDIUM: Bidium Contributors can apply to withdraw of tokens from 11th July
Body: Aside from that, Bidium platform wanted to solve the following: 1. Lack of transparency in skill evaluation- The idea of decentralized bidding platform is to improve transparency and make online bidding for goods and services more competitive. The set of vendors are assessed and pre-qualified by the operators. The technical and commercial that usually submitted by vendors are evaluated by operators. This only shows how good are the products and services offered by the vendors because they are filtered by bidding. 2.  Poor customer support- a lot of online marketplace who can't provide a better services. One factor affects the marketing is poor customer support wherein the accusation of the clients can't solve, compensate and response immediately. 3. Longer Transaction time- this is always the problem of online shop, transactions are delayed because a lot of things needed such as KYC or any identification plus slow transaction process. 4. Probability of false transaction- Another problem that affects marketplace is the inability to do business from any part of the world regardless of your physical location. Another thing I wouldn't like in online marketplace is the reliability of products. Imagine there are products I bought that are rejected or expired.  These four essential problems dealing with the online marketplace can solve buy the decentralized bidding platform, Bidium.  P.S. I am grateful on what I saw in the WP. I can understand easily the terminology.
